title: Booked for safekeeping
creator_credit: George C. Stoney and Stoney Associates
brief_description: Demonstrates management of mentally ill people who become the responsibility of the police. Discusses treatment on reception, emphasising the need for immediate attention. Shows how to cope with violent or potentially violent patients and stresses the importance of treatment in the first few hours, and discusses the need for medical assistance in gaols.
